metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3550 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Mediawiki v1.40.0 does not validate namespaces used in XML files.Therefore, if the instance administrator allows XML file uploads, a remoteattacker with a low-privileged user account can use this exploit to becomean administrator by sending a malicious link to the instance administrator.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
